channel.title: Near Reality-Old School Sever
channel.description:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/818/ossheader.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img818/8285/ossheader.png[/img][/URL]
Near Reality Old School Server is a new 317 based server, designed to bring the best era of Runescape back for all to enjoy. It has been in development for almost a year by the original creator of Near-Reality, which has been one of the biggest RSPS communities and servers for many years.
There won't be any items from after May 2006, this will keep the wilderness fun and free of overpowered weapons and armor that the majority of us have all come to hate. We have tried to perfect the server in every aspect, from skilling to PKing, so it is as similar to Runescape in 2006 as possible.
Our Forums: http://www.near-reality.com/forums/
Keep track of release date and server updates in our news section, Facebook or Twitter: News - Near Reality - Runescape Private Server
--- ---
[Near-Reality] Old School Server - YouTube Features:
- No Items from after May 2006 - Great Economy - Mage Arena - Fully working skills & combat system - Fully working RS Quests - Friendly and helpful staff team - Active forums - 5x Experience rate - Voting rewards - Regularly updated - Skilling interfaces - All specials working - Breakable Barrows armors - Repairing broken items - RS treasure trails - Random events from rs (such as genie, drunken dwarf, etc) - Choice of using Download Client or Webclient
Future updates will contain:
- Duel Arena - Farming Skill - Agility skill - Real RS fight caves
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/255/osswcing.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img255/1715/osswcing.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/59/ossfishing.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img59/112/ossfishing.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/14/oss1.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img14/1739/oss1.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/829/oss2.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img829/6157/oss2.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/547/oss4.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img547/3941/oss4.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/195/oss3.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img195/7639/oss3.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/811/oss5.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img811/4072/oss5.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/10/oss6.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img10/9436/oss6.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/694/oss7.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img694/9255/oss7.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Near Reality-Old School Sever
item.dc:creator: @Karm Karm
item.description:
@Karm wrote:

it is out. it just says future updates as stuff that will be added later. and the website brings you to our forums. you can find the download links there. We currently have this sever and a sever that has all new items/armor with customs that has been out since 2009. and im not the creator , his name is Chachi.

Read full topic
